availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Mary A. Cox Travis. Father of Martha E. Travis, Henry Clay Travis, Eudora E. Travis, Kate A. Travis, Thomas J. Travis, and Boon Travis. Farmer in Weakley County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farmer in Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Weakley County, District 2, p. 407A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Hays, 599.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, Dublin, p. 40A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994035, Graves County Births.
